quote: Magdalena doesn't ask what Rebecka is doing at the hospital. That's how Rebecka realizes that Magdalena knows. It's the things you don't say. That's what always gives a person away.
quote_letters: MAGDALENA DOESNT ASK WHAT REBECKA IS DOING AT THE HOSPITAL THATS HOW REBECKA REALIZES THAT MAGDALENA KNOWS ITS THE THINGS YOU DONT SAY THATS WHAT ALWAYS GIVES A PERSON AWAY
